naslov: Otok Korčula, Vela Luka, roh-bau vila, prvi red, prodaja (prodaja)
opis: Otok Korčula. Prodaje se Vila, prvi red do mora, sa građevinskom dozvolom, koja je dovršena u roh-bau izvedbi. Vila ima 344 m2 bruto razvijene površine i sagrađena je na zemljištu površine 570m2. Smještena je na izuzetnoj poziciji, u prekrasnoj uvali u iznimno mirnom dijelu otoka Korčule. Prednost ove nedovršene vile je što takvu nekretninu kupac može dovršiti prema svojim željama i potrebama (za obitelj ili za najam). Također, razina luksuza u kojoj se vila može završiti ovisi o želi i mogućnostima kupca odnosno o kvaliteti materijala koji će biti ugrađeni prema izboru kupca. Vila ima 3 etaže, koje su sada koncepcijski 3 zasebne stambene jedinice. U donjoj etaži suteren, koja je zapravo etaža - 1 koja je frontom cijela otvorena prema moru nalazi se jedan stan sa natkrivenom i nenatkrivenom terasom, cisternom i konobom. U prizemnoj etaži je jedan apartman sa natkrivenom i nenatkrivenom terasom. Na prvom katu se također nalazi jedan apartman sa natkrivenom i nenatkrivenom terasom. Lokacija: Uvala u kojoj je vila nalazi se na sjevernoj strani otoka. Najbliži grad je Vela Luka. Prijevoz putnika i automobila na otok (trajektom): iz Orebića (koji je poluotoku Pelješac) do grada Korčula (otok Korčula). iz Splita, preko otoka Hvara do Vela Luka (otok Korčula). Prijevoz putnika katamaranima, iz Splita do Vela Luka (otok Korčula). Dodatna informacija: Još jedna vila je sagrađena do ove vile, kojoj je prodajna cijena 1.050.000 €. Budući da obje vile prodaje ista osoba moguće ih je kupiti zajedno po ukupnoj cijeni od 2.250.000 €. Korčula Island. Villa for sale, first row to the sea, with a building permit, which has been completed in unfinished form. The villa has 344 m2 of gross developed area and was built on a plot of land of 570 m2. It is located in an exceptional position, in a beautiful bay in an exceptionally quiet part of the island of Korčula. The advantage of this unfinished villa is that the buyer can complete such a property according to his wishes and needs (for a family or for rent). Also, the level of luxury in which the villa can be completed depends on the wishes and capabilities of the buyer, or on the quality of the materials that will be installed according to the buyer's choice. The villa has 3 floors, which are now conceptually 3 separate residential units. On the lower floor, the basement, which is actually floor - 1, which is completely open to the sea, there is one apartment with a covered and uncovered terrace, a cistern and a tavern. On the ground floor there is one apartment with a covered and uncovered terrace. On the first floor there is also an apartment with a covered and uncovered terrace. Location: The bay where the villa is located is located on the northern side of the island. The nearest town is Vela Luka. Passenger and car transport to the island (by ferry): from Orebić (which is on the Pelješac peninsula) to the town of Korčula (island of Korčula). from Split, via the island of Hvar to Vela Luka (island of Korčula). Passenger transport by catamarans, from Split to Vela Luka (island of Korčula). Additional information: Another villa has been built next to this villa, which has a selling price of €1,050,000. Since both villas are being sold by the same person, it is possible to buy them together for a total price of €2,250,000.
